seo.title: Positano to Ravello by Ferry then Bus | Hostel Brikette
seo.description: Step-by-step from Positano to Ravello: walk to the port, ferry to Amalfi, then SITA bus to Ravello; tickets, timing, and smooth connection tips.

intro.title: Positano to Ravello â€” Ferry then Bus (via Amalfi)
intro.body: Use this guide to travel from Positano to Ravello by combining a scenic ferry to Amalfi and a SITA bus up to Ravello. It covers the walk to the port, ticket tips, where to transfer in Amalfi, and what to expect on arrival in Ravello.

callouts.tip: Need other transport options? Open the %HOWTO:how-to-get-here|How to Get Here overview% for buses, airport transfers, and mixed itineraries.
